amendment.description: To authorize, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluations for the Army for the Joint Service Small Arms Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1316 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1316 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To authorize, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluations for the Army for the Joint Service Small Arms Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1316 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1316 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Reed.
